vote.title: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with BAR Constructors, Inc., for additional work associated with replacing the existing sulfur dioxide piping and equipment for the sulfur dioxide evaporators at the Central Wastewater Treatment Plant - Not to exceed $1,873,456.25, from $48,559,500.00 to $50,432,956.25 - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund ($954,423.56) and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($919,032.69)
vote.description: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with BAR Constructors, Inc., for additional work associated with replacing the existing sulfur dioxide piping and equipment for the sulfur dioxide evaporators at the Central Wastewater Treatment Plant - Not to exceed $1,873,456.25, from $48,559,500.00 to $50,432,956.25 - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund ($954,423.56) and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($919,032.69)
